solution.text:
Diabetes-It is a hereditary disease
Cancer-It is caused due to environmental conditions, radiations, tobacco etc. This disease does not spread from an infected person to a healthy person through the air, water, food or physical.
Tuberculosis-This disease can be spread from an infected person to a healthy person through air, water, food or physical contact.
Asthma-It is caused due to respiratory infections, air pollutants and smoke. Hence this disease is not a communicable disease.

content.text: which of the following is a communicable disease
